rows.segment_description: Google Cloud segment includes cloud computing services and infrastructure offerings. It is reported separately from Google Services and Other Bets, reflecting its focus on cloud-based products and services. The segment's operating income increased from $1,716 million in 2023 to $6,112 million in 2024.
rows.primary_source: 10-K Part I, Item 1 Business and Note 15

rows.segment_description: Google Services segment encompasses various consumer and advertiser-facing products and platforms. This includes Google Search and other related services, YouTube advertising, Google Network, and Google subscriptions, platforms, and devices. The segment showed significant operating income growth from $95,858 million in 2023 to $121,263 million in 2024.
rows.primary_source: 10-K Part I, Item 1 Business and Note 15

rows.segment_description: Other Bets segment includes Alphabet's experimental and emerging businesses outside of Google Services and Google Cloud. This segment reported operating losses of $4,095 million in 2023 and $4,444 million in 2024, reflecting ongoing investments in these ventures.
rows.primary_source: 10-K Part I, Item 1 Business and Note 15
